Text: I can't open the file with Comical for some reason...

Allright people! Those having issues with opening this file with comical try this:
1) Copypaste the file.
2) When you have your ''Copy of...'', rename it from .cbz to .zip
3) Extract all the images.
4) Make a new zip folder
5) Put all the images into this new zip folder.
6) Rename this new zip folder from .zip to .cbz
7) Read, enjoy and seed to 2.0 or more ratio

Oh yeah!
8) Remember to say ''thank you wowcabbage for uploading another great comic''
well I really look forward to the new 52's and must say ... grt job wowcabbae...
